Thai restaurant offering lovely ambiance, an intimate dining experience, and delicious dishes.  Very friendly owners and staff.  The vegetables always taste qutie fresh.  178 E. Main St.
Thai restaurant with fast, friendly service and good lunch deals.  196 East Main St.
: Another good Thai restaurant.  Go here if you're in a rush or with a big group: the service is quite fast, and the dining room is quite large.  9 Medway Road
American Italian fare, plus a sushi menu.  Variety!
Come here for an elegant-casual evening of great drinks & American fusion cuisine.  198 East Main St.

Standard Tex-Mex in a very fun atmosphere.  Lunch deals are quite affordable.  Homemade chips and salsa!  55 Medway Rd. '''
Acapulco's:''' Local Mexican chain.  Rock solid margaritas and generous portions. 231 E Main St.
Sushi restaurant offering good Sushi standbys.  194 West St.

I don't know if they import the NYC water or what, but these house made authentic bagels are as close as you'll get in Metrowest MA!  Delicious cream cheese varieties, sandwiches, breakfast sandwiches, and coffee in both hot and iced.  196 E Main St.
: Diner for breakfast and lunch.  Open quite early!  220 Main St.

value: content=Suburban Boston area hotel 35 minutes from Logan Airport. Nice amenities like an indoor heated pool and gym.
